attributes.action: Take firm action against the dictatorship of Robert Mugabe and stop the crisis in Zimbabwe before a civil war erupts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This dictator has raped his own country and persecuted his own people. It's time for the British to do the right thing and remove him from power. Historian's say the greatest gift we gave to the world was a modern democracy and it's our duty (as the mother of all parliaments) to defend the liberty and freedom of the citizens of Zimbabwe.

We call on Britain and the other superpowers to take a firm stance agianst Robert Mugabe and preserve the lives of the millions suffering as a result of his tyranical regime.

rejection.details: There are other similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=zimbabwe&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=action+zimbabwe&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0 -
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
